        public static boolean checkFileFormatByPath​(java.lang.String path)
        Verifies if file format is WAVE by checking its path.
        Parameters:
        path - The absolute path of the file.
        Returns:
        true iff the file format is WAVE.

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        content - The string to write.

                                                            java.io.File folder)

        Parameters:
        name - The pattern name.
        folder - The folder to search.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of files.

      • wipe

        public static void wipe​(java.lang.String pattern,
                        java.io.File folder)
        Deletes the text files in the given folder with the specified pattern. Example: wipe("CONFIG_LOG", new File(logs)) will reset all logs with the name "CONFIG_LOG".
        Parameters:
        pattern - The string pattern of the file names.
        folder - The folder of logs.

      • compressText

        public static void compressText​(java.lang.String pattern,
                                java.io.File folder,
                                java.io.File destination)
        Compresses the text files with the given pattern into the destination folder.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern for the file name.
        folder - The folder of text files.
        destination - The destination folder.
